title: Speaking of animals: in South America
brief_description: Very humorous North American view of Brazilian/South American jungle life. Great early animation technique. Commentary a bit twee but humorous voice-overs depicting Clark Gable and Ma Kettle give it a great touch. Animation by George Grimshaw. Narration by Ken Carpenter.
